channel.title: ChronicScape718
channel.description:
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/pasr63cu79dfb9r/Chronic%20Scape.jar WEBCLIENT: COMING SOON
Features:
Squeal of Fortune 100% Money Pouch Clue Scrolls Pk/Eco Working PkP Point system with 2 PkP shops Lucky Items and their special attacks/stats Commands for spellbooks, altar for curses 100% Dicing ( Clan )
Npc's:
King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons with all prayers and attacks Full Nex with all 4 stages Full Godwars Dungeon, with teleports and working altars ( with timers ) Corporeal beast Frost dragons
